name: Chocolate & Vanilla Star Soaps
description:
A set of two chocolate and vanilla star soaps, with organic dark chocolate scent and vanilla extract. 

Vanilla extract has many benefits on the skin, including anti-inflammatory properties that can help to soothe and calm inflamed areas on the skin. Vanilla is a natural antioxidant and has plenty of B vitamins, including niacin, which is a key nutrient in the maintenance of healthy skin.

[Contains SLS-free base, vanilla extracts, dark chocolate scent.]

name: Golden Honey Star Soap
description:
Cute star shaped soap with a golden honey scent! Made with natural oils and honey. 

Honey is amazing for skin and can help against acne, aging, and complexion.

[Contains SLS-free base, honey essential oil, yellow food dye, orange food dye.]

name: Organic Honey & Oatmeal Soap
description:
This gorgeous oatmeal soap produces a creamy lather, has rich honey scents, and is great for your skin. I am a huge fan of this soap personally and can't get enough of it. 

The benefits of oatmeal on skin:

Oatmeal has anti-inflammatory properties and is good for most skin types, even the most sensitive skin. It works as a mild cleansing agent and helps remove dead skin cells. 

The benefits of honey on skin: 

Honey is naturally antibacterial and full of antioxidants, so it's great for aging and complexion. Your skin will feel soothed and glowing. 

[Contains SLS-free base, stone ground oatmeal, honey essential oil. NOTE: this product contains raw honey.]

name: Spiced Apple & Chamomile Soap Set
description:
Set of two round Spiced Apple & Chamomile soaps. 

Known for its soothing, calming and anti-inflammatory benefits, Chamomile is great for gentle skin care. Produces a soft, light lather and leaves your skin feeling fresh. Great little gift idea or something to treat yourself, perfect for the winter months.

[Contains SLS-free base, Spiced Apple essential oil, Chamomile herbs.]
